name: Heaven and Earth - Ludum Dare version
name_original: Heaven and Earth - Ludum Dare version
description:
Heaven and Earth.....

....are not two separate realms ... as what happens here effects what happens there... and what happens there effects what happens here... both enlivening each other....one good deed spread as a ripple into the far reaches of the Universe... so beware of the bad ones... and also keep in mind that you're never alone...
